location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to John Beaumont and George Green, Factors at Bushire from William Hornby, John Carnac, Daniel Draper, Nathaniel Stackhouse, William Ashburner, Andrew Ramsay at Bombay Castle.

physicalDescription.extent: This item is damaged and has several holes in its text.

mods.abstract: Letter discusses sales of woolens and cloth. Letter also gives approval for the Residency to spend 6-7,000 rupees on refurbishment of its premises.The letter states that extracts from the Company's Commands are enclosed and these follow the letter in the file.
